name: The Last Door: Season 2 - Collector's Edition
description: In Season 2 of The Last Door, the search for his missing client will bring psychiatrist John Wakefield deeper into a conspiracy of darkness and closer to the heart of madness than ever before.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 or greater (SSE2 Compatible) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Pentium 4 or greater (SSE2 Compatible) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 compatible DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 300 MB available space
